description.value:
This small brass sphere unfolds to reveal a collection of crystal lenses, levers, and dials that provide guidance to nearby portals.

Wondrous Item: Uncommon

Property:

You can use the Plane Shift ritual as if you have the Ritual Caster feat and are of the appropriate level. When you perform the Plane Shift ritual, the component cost is halved, and it takes half the time to complete the ritual. You gain a +4 item bonus on the ritual's Arcana check.

Power - Daily ()

Special. Use this power only during a short or an extended rest. You learn the direction and distance to a fixed location that you have previously visited.
